press_lid.description: Press down the lid to dispense soap or sanitizer.

clean_pressing_lid.description: Clean the pressing lid to ensure proper functioning and hygiene.

press_and_clean_lid.description: Press the lid to dispense product and then clean the pressing lid for hygiene.

clean_lid.description: Clean the lid to maintain hygiene.

rotate_lid.description: Rotate the lid for inspection or maintenance.

rotate_and_clean_lid.description: Rotate the lid for inspection or maintenance and then clean it.

clean_dispenser_body.description: Clean the body of the dispenser to maintain cleanliness and hygiene.

clean_body.description: Clean the dispenser body to maintain hygiene.

clean_whole_dispenser.description: Clean the entire dispenser including the pressing lid, lid and dispenser body.

use_dispenser.description: Press the lid to use the dispenser then clean the pressing lid for hygiene purposes.

general_use_dispenser.description: Press the lid to dispense product, clean the pressing lid and then clean the body of the dispenser.

thorough_cleaning_dispenser.description: Clean the pressing lid, then the lid and then the body of the dispenser.

maintainence_of_dispenser.description: Rotate the lid for inspection or maintainence, clean the lid, press the pressing lid, then clean the pressing lid and the body of the dispenser.
